title: What are you doing after BASLP? - Quora
tags: Bachelors in Audiology and Speech Language Pathology

response.answer_text: You may work as an Audiologist, Speech Language Therapist , Speech Language Pathologist ,Rehabilitation specialist ,Hearing aids marketer, Hearing aids specialist, Instructor/Teacher (at special schools) or ngos.Some well known employers/places where graduates may find job after completing BASLP course are-Government and Private Hospitals (departments like Neurology, Paediatrics and ENT)Rehabilitation Clinics, Special Schools for Children suffering from hearing and speech disorders,NGOs, Hearing aids and implants manufacturing companies, Research firms etc. Or in terms of education you can study masters degree in it.Good luck.

I did my masters in speech and hearing from manipal Itself. Back then we had a chance to do masters in both the field. Since 2018 batch , the curriculum is changed. Masters program can be done one at a time . One has to choose either audio or speech for the masters degree. I directly applied to job before my final exams . I took one month rest at home and joined work.
